page.title: 08TOURISM CARAVANING
page.content: MY PARENTS ARE THE MANAGERS OF A LOCAL CARAVAN AND CAMPING SITE, SITUATED ON THE BANKS OF THE RIVER URE AT SLENINGFORD WATERMILL. THE SITE WAS WHERE AN OLD CORN MILL USED TO BE.THE RIVER URE IS ONE OF THE MAIN ATTRACTIONS FOR THE SITE.PEOPLE WHO COME ARE ABLE TO FLY_FISH,CANOE, SWIM,PADDLE ORJUST ENJOY THE BEAUTIFUL SURROUNDINGS.THE RIVER CAN BE DANGEROUS AFTER HEAVEY RAIN,IT CAN RISE IN ONLY TWO AND A HALF MINUTES.IF PEOPLE COME AND STAY ON THE SITE,THE RIVER SPORTS ARE FREE,BUT THE FISHERMEN HAVE TO PAY Â£4 PER DAY.VISITORS WHO JUST COME FOR THE DAY HAVE TO PAY Â£1 TO BE ABLE TO CANOE.OUR SITE HAS ROOM FOR 50 TOURING AND SEASONAL CARAVANS AND ABOUT 50 TENTS, ALTHOUGH THIS CAN BE INCREASED IF MORE PITCHES ARE NEEDED.
